entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:05 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure: 98.2 kPa
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: SSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
